segments.text: Excuse me , is this the right counter for express mail ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to send some important documents to Canada for my postgraduate admission .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the deadline for applying is 1st Feb , so I hope they will arrive in 3 days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , DHL is famous for its speed and reliability . It is the fastest international postal service available . The document will arrive in two or three days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? But can you guarantee the safety ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I promise . Your document won't be broken or lost . All the items are handled by special staff and carried by a courier . It is reliable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I will send them now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please write the address and remittee on the express order and make sure there is no mistake on them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is your receipt which you have to keep until the remittee receives the express . You can also check your post on our web . The post number is on the top of the receipt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I have got quite clear idea of it .
segments.speaker: S1
